category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CLS_search_apply_read_access_check
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether to include the 'read only' objects during a Classification object search. Valid values are: * true: only objects for which the user has read access, are returned by the Classification search. * false: all objects matching the search criteria are returned, without taking read access status into account. This is the default value.
